Row.Text: 一张屏风和几套桌椅，一个说书人和一壶好茶。茶室是包括岩王帝君在内的璃月人都喜欢光顾的地方。除了评书之外，要是遇上了云堇上戏台的日子，闻名而来的看客能把小小的茶馆里三层外三层围得水泄不通。
Keqing and the workers she is leading are impressively productive. They will make use of every inch of land under their foot.

Liyue with Keqing's lead can expand and develop massive amount of tiles effectivly, and settlers with quick movement can reach important stategic location ahead of any one else.[NEWLINE]With the support of Ganyu, Liyue has world leading ability of trading and economic.

The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.[NEWLINE]One of the Liyue Qixing, Keqing has an uncompromising belief in actions over words. If she sees something that needs doing, she'll do it herself. For example, she traveled around Liyue and carefully memorized each detail of the land so that she may one day be able to maximize the utility of every last inch of Liyue.

Keqing deals with the day-to-day affairs of Liyue, whether great or small, while Rex Lapis only descends once a year.[NEWLINE]To many, the millennia of prosperity that Liyue has enjoyed serve to legitimize Rex Lapis' guidance of the city. But Keqing has her reservations about all this, viewing Liyue's present prosperity as akin to a magnificent sandcastle on the beach — humanity does not have the luxury of deciding when the tide will come in.[NEWLINE]"Rex Lapis has watched over Liyue for a millennium. But what about the next millennium? What about the next ten, or the next hundred millennia? How long are we expecting this status quo to last?"[NEWLINE]It is this unanswered question that drives Keqing to work relentlessly and remain diligent.[NEWLINE]From most people's perspective, there is no point in working oneself up like this. But Keqing cannot sit by idly and ignore this hidden danger.[NEWLINE]The people of Liyue have never considered navigating the future on their own terms. But someone must walk on the front line of the epoch and forge a new path with their own hands.[NEWLINE]From most people's perspective, there is no point in working oneself up like this. But Keqing cannot sit by idly and ignore this hidden danger.

Rex Lapis' departure has put Liyue Harbor through a great deal of hardship. All the duties Rex once fulfilled have been taken up by the Qixing and the Eight Trades.[NEWLINE]Now that divine rule is a thing of the past, the old strictures left behind can't simply be continued wholesale. But to establish new laws for Liyue, whose history spans several thousand years, is no mean feat.

At first, Keqing was incredibly enthusiastic about this task, having long prepared for this day when she might finally show her mettle. But several months in, and she was still stuck on a single task, land infrastructure — and it was driving her up the wall.[NEWLINE]No matter how hard she struggled, the mountain of tasks was like a quagmire. She was making a difference, yes, but not nearly with as much ease as Rex Lapis.[NEWLINE]"Why can I only do this much? Why... can't I do it better?"[NEWLINE]Of course, she had long understood the wherefores here.[NEWLINE]Her lack of respect for the gods had somehow received their recognition all the same, yes, but that didn't mean that she was ready to simply replace them.[NEWLINE]But she was still Keqing, resolute and tenacious. From that day on, she shut herself in, studying classics of various kinds to learn all that she needed. Placing herself lowest, she accepted all that she had hitherto not known with open arms.[NEWLINE]During this period, she gained a certain calm, slowly discarding the "opprobrium" she had long held against Rex Lapis. They were both working for the good of Liyue, after all — and two people who love the same thing need not be on opposing sides.[NEWLINE]She also seemingly came to an understanding concerning the smile Rex Lapis had given her during the Rite of Descension. It was, Keqing now believes, an expression of acknowledgement and expectation.[NEWLINE]She hasn't lost any of her forceful and decisive manner, no. But sometimes, when she feels lost, she will stop and think: "What would Rex Lapis do at a moment such as this?"
Ningguang knows everything happening in Liyue harbor, her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.
Ningguang has powerful intelligence and anti-spy abilities, this make sure no one can damage Liyue in dark. As a professional businesswoman, she can earn extra profit from international businesses.
The secretary of the Liyue Qixing
The secretary of the Liyue Qixing
Ganyu is the architect of administrative efficiency.[NEWLINE]She cares of the civilians' livelihood, provides bonus in multiple areas.
Drink only spring water, eat only whole grain. Proceed with elegance, avoid certain peril.

For the Liyue Qixing of the lofty Yujing Terrace, Ganyu is not merely a companion to serve them, but is instead coordinator of the web of information that moves across Liyue Harbor, and the architect of administrative efficiency.[NEWLINE]Complex meeting minutes, disorderly report data... Every day piles of documents flow by like water, each one personally compiled by her into clear and concise words in order to assist the Qixing's every decision and negotiation as they flow through various organizational departments.

In the eons that have gone by, the Qixing have changed with each succession of their posts, while only Ganyu has lived to see the flourishing of Liyue Harbor from beginning to the modern day.[NEWLINE]The human blood that runs through her veins makes her reluctant to leave the splendor of the city lights, while her adeptus side leads her to yearn for the gentle serenity of her adeptal homeland.[NEWLINE]For the half-human, half-adeptus Ganyu, between the bustling sea of people and the ethereal clustered peaks, which is more fitting to call home?
Returns to her work in no time. +3[ICON_Amenities]Amenities。

As the secretary of Yuehai Pavilion, Ganyu undertakes many tasks that ordinary folk do not see. The calculations and data behind the Qixing's every decision in Liyue, as well as every ordinance and regulation that is announced, are all the meticulous work of Ganyu.

Each daybreak she stands by the dock, enjoying her breakfast in silence. Even still, by the time the sun has fully risen, she will have returned to Yuehai Pavilion overlooking Yujing Terrace, to continue to fulfill her contract — one that she signed three thousand years ago with Rex Lapis.
Provide unique ability according to Leader.(Details in Civilopidia)

"Decision helper" provides one of the following bonuses according to Leader: [NEWLINE]For Keqing: +1 Road Level, enable using builders to help constuct districts.[NEWLINE]For Ningguang: 20% discount when purchasing districts, buildings, units in this city.

They are aware that the Liyue Qixing are the cream of the crop who hold the fate of the city in their hands, but the calculations and data behind the Qixing's every decision are far harder to grasp.[NEWLINE]The people understand that the new policies announced each year will change the dynamics of the market, yet none can comprehend how policy is plucked from complex meeting minutes and compiled into something easier on the human eye.
City +10[ICON_Ranged]ranged attack strength，and one extra[ICON_Ranged]shot.[NEWLINE]Ranged units trained in this city gets free promotion.
Provide fresh water for the city. +3[ICON_Food]food for improved crop resource in the city.

How long is a thousand years?[NEWLINE]Long enough for the Glaze Lilies that once teemed throughout Dihua Marsh to be wiped out by floodwaters, and long enough for the thriving settlement that sprung up upon Guili Plains to come to ruin in war.[NEWLINE]How short is a thousand years?[NEWLINE]To Ganyu, it has felt shorter than the blink of an eye.

Throughout a passage of time unimaginable to mortals, Ganyu has been working on all manner of things at Yujing Terrace.[NEWLINE]She recorded the raising and demolishing of every building, and witnessed the rise to prosperity of every industry.[NEWLINE]Ganyu's sense of objectivity towards the passage of time comes from the endless reams of data she must trawl through, and from the ever-increasing number of colors she finds that she needs to categorize it all.

All this time, her mindset has never changed — she constantly wavers between her human and adeptus halves.[NEWLINE]On one hand, Ganyu the qilin finds it difficult to comprehend mortal squabbles. But on the other hand, her human blood reminds her always to hold out hope that she might someday be able to fit in.
Extra available district in city，and the availability to purchase using[ICON_Gold]Gold.
Regional effect from buildings can now spread 6 tiles further. Allow the city to receive[ICON_Production]production bonus from multiple industrial districts.
If you feel strongly about something, you should speak up and take action. That's the philosophy I live by.
I am Keqing, Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. My role is to manage real estate and construction in Liyue.
Liyue is a vast place with abundant resources. I will show you around. You deserve to see Liyue cities with your own eyes.
Let's go, time is against us.
Would you like some kindly exchange of capital information? In return, I will show you around when you come to see our capital Liyue one day.
Accepted. I like you as you make up your own mind.
赌徒永远会把希望寄托在下一颗骰子上。但最后赚钱的，当然是从来不碰骰子的庄家。
